exercises.title: Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet a little wider than shoulder-width apart, hips stacked over knees, and knees over ankles.

exercises.title: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Start by standing up tall. Step forward with one foot until your leg reaches a 90-degree angle.

exercises.title: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

exercises.title: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

exercises.title: Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie face down with forearms on the floor and hands clasped. Extend the legs behind the body and rise up on the toes.

exercises.title: Ankle Circles
exercises.instructions: Lean back against a wall and stick one leg out. Rotate slowly both clockwise and counterclockwise at the ankle.
